title: Coppola's Pathos Watch Faces
summary: From canvas to Wear, Coppola's Pathos Watch Faces brings art on your wrist!
description: ❄ On SaLe for Yuletide! ❄Michele Coppola is a gentle artist from Naples, a land where the finest Italian style meets the emotional power of the Vesuvius. His paintings reveal his hermetic soul in a vast variety of shades and shapes, expressed by different techniques, traits and subjects.We selected three art pieces from Michele’s collection to be part of a elegant and bold watch face for Android Wear:  each piece express a strong, deep, powerful emotion that will bring your watch to life.☆ Elpìs - Hope☆ Lyssa - Frenzy☆ Dysis - AnticipationFeatures✓ Analog watch face with seconds hand and tick marks✓ Choose from three different art pieces by Michele Coppola: for each one, six fragment are extracted to be used as your watch face✓ Choose your favorite fragment or activate the hourly cycle switch from the handheld companion app✓ Customize the seconds hand color: each art piece has his own palette to choose from✓ Fade&Rotate Art revealing animation on state transactions - from Ambient to Interactive mode and vice versa; ✓ On Ambient mode, a subtle touch of your favurite accent color will adorn the watch face✓ Optimized for both round and square displays✓ Support for Ambient mode;✓ Handheld companion app for customization - use the Android Wear companion app to access the customization screen;CreditsArt pieces by Michele Coppola | Designed & developed by Luigi Notaro
descriptionHTML:
❄ On SaLe for Yuletide! ❄

Michele Coppola is a gentle artist from Naples, a land where the finest Italian style meets the emotional power of the Vesuvius. His paintings reveal his hermetic soul in a vast variety of shades and shapes, expressed by different techniques, traits and subjects.

We selected three art pieces from Michele’s collection to be part of a elegant and bold watch face for Android Wear: each piece express a strong, deep, powerful emotion that will bring your watch to life.

☆ Elpìs - Hope
☆ Lyssa - Frenzy
☆ Dysis - Anticipation

Features
✓ Analog watch face with seconds hand and tick marks
✓ Choose from three different art pieces by Michele Coppola: for each one, six fragment are extracted to be used as your watch face
✓ Choose your favorite fragment or activate the hourly cycle switch from the handheld companion app
✓ Customize the seconds hand color: each art piece has his own palette to choose from

✓ Fade&Rotate Art revealing animation on state transactions - from Ambient to Interactive mode and vice versa;
✓ On Ambient mode, a subtle touch of your favurite accent color will adorn the watch face

✓ Optimized for both round and square displays
✓ Support for Ambient mode;
✓ Handheld companion app for customization - use the Android Wear companion app to access the customization screen;

Credits
Art pieces by Michele Coppola | Designed & developed by Luigi Notaro
recentChanges: - Full support for Low-Bit Ambient Mode [great for OLED screens]
- Full support for Burn In Protection
